Reviews.Title: Well Pleased
Reviews.Author: Auntais Faulkner
Reviews.Content: I was well pleased when My package arrived all together 1 day earlier than expected. All the components were accounted for and in tact. I love this camera because it take great photos and allows you to have  your own creative technique with the Manual mode.-Few cons: The tripod is kind of cheap and it does not position on the anchor evenly.-One of my telephoto lens had some bumpage in the factory but it works completely fine.To know: The external flash does not come with batteries.

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT package deal... & GREAT camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Tamika Golden
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. Im taking a beginner photography class & im learning all the different type of pictures I can take & all its different functions..

Reviews.Title: I'm in love
Reviews.Author: jessica shipley
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  I'm in love, I'm in love and I don't care who knows it!  Exactly what I was looking for.  This has become my 'go-to' camera.  I have taken it everywhere.  Clean, crisp pictures.  And with all of the extra's you get......you'd be a fool to pass up this deal!

Reviews.Title: Worth it..!!
Reviews.Author: kartheek
Reviews.Content: It was more than what I expected would get for this amount. Many gadgets and powerful camera. It's great for anyone pursuing professional photography

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel Bundle
Reviews.Author: James Powell
Reviews.Content: Delivered fast for the weather. Everything was there in the bundle.Smile on her face--Priceless.My Nikon outfit cost me close to $1000 once all was finally bought separately. she has more stuff than I do.Great Bundle for the money.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal!
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: This bundle came with so many components that I'm not even sure what some of them are for!  Everything came neatly packaged, brand new in their boxes and I couldn't be happier with these products.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful camera and comes with lots of accessories. We are still learning how to use this camera but feel it was a great bargain.

Reviews.Title: Complete package
Reviews.Author: Rappin
Reviews.Content: Always looked into getting a better quality camera. This was a great package. I don't have to buy anything more. I did recommend to my family

Reviews.Title: happy camper
Reviews.Author: Brittani Gadbaw
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this purchase. Fantastic deal for the price. Got everything that was listed.  All brand new

Reviews.Title: Asesore buy
Reviews.Author: Rubén Prieto
Reviews.Content: I gave this buy 5 stars Because it has everything you need if you want to start in the photography hobby or as a serious one, i absolutely love the way the camera works the lenses and everything it came with i recommend it to any one who is interested you won't regret buying it

Reviews.Title: Good price and good camera
Reviews.Author: Fernando Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: For a newby it's the perfect choice, excelent price and good performance, recomended to all that want to begin in the art of photography

Reviews.Title: awesome camera bundle
Reviews.Author: Stuart N Roundy
Reviews.Content: This has been a blast to have.... I use it following my son in high school wrestling, and it does a fine job.  I've also enjoyed learning about all of the capabilities of a dslr.

Reviews.Title: For Baby Pics
Reviews.Author: gracie "gracie"
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this camera for me for Christmas.  We have a 4 month old son.  I love it!  I'm taking pics of him all the time.  True, there is alot to learn about this camera, but I'm willing.  Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Loved the package idea for a gift
Reviews.Author: James O.
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my daughter.  She had nothing to speak of as a camera. We both thought it was a very good way to get started. The price we felt was very good considering what she got in the package.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves her new camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Wise
Reviews.Content: Great deal.  Everything works perfectly.  Shipping was fast and packed correctly.  The wife has an older Olympus. She is so much more impressed with this camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Newberry
Reviews.Content: Love the product! Very easy to use, especially for a beginner!! I learn something new about the camera/accessories every time I use it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Great bundle! Was missing one lens plastic lens cover for wide angle/telephoto lenses. The memory card reader doesn't work either(luckily my laptop has one). Other than those two things everything was included and works great!!

Reviews.Title: first digital camera
Reviews.Author: marty mciver
Reviews.Content: I thought the price was descent for my first digital camera.I will be taking it on vacation with me in july

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: We love the product's brand, has worked great for me. Yes i would recommend it. Most of all great price

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Paul Coviello
Reviews.Content: For the amount of money we spent since I'm used to buying from Amazon I could have went somewhere else and for a better quality camera. I would not recommend this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> Spare LP-E10 Battery for Canon + <5> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <6> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <9> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <10> 58mm UV Filter +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm IS Lens with 75-300mm Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + 3 Filters + Tripod + Flash + Tele/Wide Lens Kit
